name: Alhaitham
desc:
"Admonishing Instruction" Alhaitham

Learning, thinking, and taking care of business.

imgDesc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena

value.text: Reward for inviting Alhaitham to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

value.name: Alhaitham
value.desc: The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya, a man endowed with extraordinary intelligence and talent. He lives free â€” free from the searching eyes of ordinary people, anyway.

customize.name: Alhaitham
customize.desc:
"Admonishing Instruction" Alhaitham

Learning, thinking, and taking care of business.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Using games to train your brain now and then... Not a bad idea."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Alhaitham's deck contains large numbers of Event Cards that allow him to control the pace of the game, giving him a chance to attack by triggering many Quicken Reactions.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Alhaitham
customize.desc:
"Admonishing Instruction" Alhaitham

Learning, thinking, and taking care of business.

customize.name: Yae Miko
customize.desc:
"Astute Amusement" Yae Miko

The wise and beautiful Yae Miko.

customize.name: Cyno
customize.desc:
"Judicator of Secrets" Cyno

The card bears the General Mahamatra's ardent fondness, which reminds one of the scorching sun hanging above the desert

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Alhaitham
customize.desc:

Learning, thinking, and taking care of business.

customize.name: Structuration
customize.desc:
Alhaitham: Structuration

"A process of elimination."

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Structuration
customize.desc:
Alhaitham: Structuration

"A process of elimination."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"It seems that experience outweighs pure logic when it comes to cards... So let's play again."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Alhaitham" starts with the Talent Card "Structuration" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Chisel-Light Mirror</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Chisel-Light Mirror</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt by the character is converted to <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>After this character performs a Normal Attack:</color> Deal 1 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> . If it is a <color=#ffffff>Charged Attack</color> , this state's <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> +1.
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> : 2 (Can stack. Max 3 Rounds.)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> , consumes <color=#ffffff>Chisel-Light Mirror</color> , with the DMG bonus based on <color=#ffffff>Chisel-Light Mirror</color> 's <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> consumed.
If <color=#ffffff>Chisel-Light Mirror Duration (Rounds)</color> consumed is 0/1/2, then apply <color=#ffffff>Chisel-Light Mirror</color> with 3/2/1 <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> to this character.
<color=#ece5d8>Chisel-Light Mirror</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt by the character is converted to <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>After this character performs a Normal Attack:</color> Deal 1 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> . If it is a <color=#ffffff>Charged Attack</color> , this state's <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> +1.
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> : 2 (Can stack. Max 3 Rounds.)

Applies Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that greants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Charged Attack</color>
Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
